code: import React from'react';import Platform from"react-native-web/dist/exports/Platform";var getAbsoluteChildren=function getAbsoluteChildren(children,reverse){var childrenArray=React.Children.toArray(children);if(reverse){childrenArray=childrenArray.reverse();}var trailingChildrenWithSpacing=childrenArray.map(function(child){return React.cloneElement(child,Platform.OS==='web'?{style:{position:'absolute'}}:{position:'absolute'},child.props.children);});return[trailingChildrenWithSpacing];};export default getAbsoluteChildren;
